ygData.subject: New Gladiator Group
ygData.msgSnippet: I have created a special yahoo group just to deal with setting up and implementing gladiator tournaments.  For now, anyone can look up message archives.

Subject: New Gladiator Group
Message-ID: <9hucej+a18p@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 668
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
X-eGroups-Announce: yes
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I have created a special yahoo group just to deal with setting up and 
implementing gladiator tournaments.  For now, anyone can look up 
message archives.

Membership will be by approval of the moderator.  No deadbeat members 
will be allowed in this group.

Why a separate group?  One reason: just to get work done on a 
tournament without boring other people who don't care about the 
internal workings of a tournament.

The location is groups.yahoo.com/group/glad-tourny .  I will be 
checking potential members of this new group to see if there are 
members of this group.  If you are not a member of this group, denial 
of membership of the new group is certain.
